mapper.select: select * from v_pcmtxfpsq t1 where pcmtxfpsqid=#{id}
select * from v_pcmtxfpsq t1 where pcmtxfpsqid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BM`, t1.`BMID`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CHECKSTATUS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZR`, t1.`CZRID`, t1.`FINISHED`, t1.`FPSXSJ`, t1.`LXDH`, t1.`NL`, t1.`ZZID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`BMID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`PCMPROFILEID`, t1.`PCMTXFPSQID`, t1.`PCMTXFPSQNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`POSTALADDRESS`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`TXDQ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XYGBH`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`ZZ`, t1.`ZZID` FROM `T_PCMTXFPSQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID

SELECT t1.BM, t1.BMID, t1.BZ, t1.CHECKSTATUS, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZR, t1.CZRID, t1.FINISHED, t1.FPSXSJ, t1.LXDH, t1.NL, t1.ZZID AS ORGID, t1.BMID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.PCMPROFILEID, t1.PCMTXFPSQID, t1.PCMTXFPSQNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.POSTALADDRESS, t1.RANK, t1.TXDQ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XYGBH, t1.YGBH, t1.YGW, t1.YZW, t1.ZZ, t1.ZZID FROM T_PCMTXFPSQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID

SELECT t1.`BM`, t1.`BMID`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CHECKSTATUS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZR`, t1.`CZRID`, t1.`FINISHED`, t1.`FPSXSJ`, t1.`LXDH`, t1.`NL`, t1.`ZZID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`BMID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`PCMPROFILEID`, t1.`PCMTXFPSQID`, t1.`PCMTXFPSQNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`POSTALADDRESS`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`TXDQ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XYGBH`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`ZZ`, t1.`ZZID` FROM `T_PCMTXFPSQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.`FINISHED` = 0 )

SELECT t1.BM, t1.BMID, t1.BZ, t1.CHECKSTATUS, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZR, t1.CZRID, t1.FINISHED, t1.FPSXSJ, t1.LXDH, t1.NL, t1.ZZID AS ORGID, t1.BMID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.PCMPROFILEID, t1.PCMTXFPSQID, t1.PCMTXFPSQNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.POSTALADDRESS, t1.RANK, t1.TXDQ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XYGBH, t1.YGBH, t1.YGW, t1.YZW, t1.ZZ, t1.ZZID FROM T_PCMTXFPSQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.FINISHED = 0 )

SELECT t1.`BM`, t1.`BMID`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CHECKSTATUS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZR`, t1.`CZRID`, t1.`FINISHED`, t1.`FPSXSJ`, t1.`LXDH`, t1.`NL`, t1.`ZZID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`BMID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`PCMPROFILEID`, t1.`PCMTXFPSQID`, t1.`PCMTXFPSQNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`POSTALADDRESS`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`TXDQ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XYGBH`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`ZZ`, t1.`ZZID` FROM `T_PCMTXFPSQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.`FINISHED` = 1 )

SELECT t1.BM, t1.BMID, t1.BZ, t1.CHECKSTATUS, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZR, t1.CZRID, t1.FINISHED, t1.FPSXSJ, t1.LXDH, t1.NL, t1.ZZID AS ORGID, t1.BMID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.PCMPROFILEID, t1.PCMTXFPSQID, t1.PCMTXFPSQNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.POSTALADDRESS, t1.RANK, t1.TXDQ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XYGBH, t1.YGBH, t1.YGW, t1.YZW, t1.ZZ, t1.ZZID FROM T_PCMTXFPSQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.FINISHED = 1 )

SELECT t1.`BM`, t1.`BMID`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CHECKSTATUS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZR`, t1.`CZRID`, t1.`FINISHED`, t1.`FPSXSJ`, t1.`LXDH`, t1.`NL`, t1.`ZZID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`BMID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`PCMPROFILEID`, t1.`PCMTXFPSQID`, t1.`PCMTXFPSQNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`POSTALADDRESS`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`TXDQ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XYGBH`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGW`, t1.`YZW`, t1.`ZZ`, t1.`ZZID` FROM `T_PCMTXFPSQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.`FINISHED` IS NOT NULL )

SELECT t1.BM, t1.BMID, t1.BZ, t1.CHECKSTATUS, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZR, t1.CZRID, t1.FINISHED, t1.FPSXSJ, t1.LXDH, t1.NL, t1.ZZID AS ORGID, t1.BMID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.PCMPROFILEID, t1.PCMTXFPSQID, t1.PCMTXFPSQNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.POSTALADDRESS, t1.RANK, t1.TXDQ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XYGBH, t1.YGBH, t1.YGW, t1.YZW, t1.ZZ, t1.ZZID FROM T_PCMTXFPSQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.FINISHED IS NOT NULL )
